activities.name: Get extraction scripts for all tables

dependsOn.activity: Get extraction scripts for all tables

activities.name: Copy data from SQL to Blob

text.value: @concat('select max(starttime) as StartTime from [etl_schema].[EXECUTION_LOG] where PIPELINENAME=''',pipeline().Pipeline,''' AND SOURCE_OBJECT_NAME=''',item().TableName,''' AND EXECUTION_STATUS=''SUCCESS''')

dependsOn.activity: Copy data from SQL to Blob

value.value: @sub(activity('Copy data from SQL to Blob').output.rowsRead, activity('Copy data from SQL to Blob').output.rowsCopied)
